members.name: IIRFilterNode()
members.description: Creates a new instance of an IIRFilterNode object.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: Options are as follows: feedforward: A sequence of feedforward coefficients. feedback: A sequence of feedback coefficients.

members.name: getFrequencyResponse()
members.description: Uses the filter's current parameter settings to calculate the response for frequencies specified in the provided array of frequencies.

parameters.name: frequencyArray
parameters.description: A Float32Array containing an array of frequencies, specified in Hertz, which you want to filter.

parameters.name: magResponseOutput
parameters.description: A Float32Array to receive the computed magnitudes of the freqency response for each frequency value in the frequencyArray.

parameters.name: phaseResponseOutput
parameters.description: AÂ Float32Array to receive the computed phase response values in radians for each frequency value in the input frequencyArray.

parameters.name: NotSupportedError
parameters.description: The three arrays provided are not all of the same length.
